topic.title: The Cult of Ron
topic.body:
We're looking for some talented individuals!

http://uhkhpnxopcrjvgmd.onion/

1565657679_1DST8biLYRqXPXeJGhxUt1dBsT6QM.body:
> [joalmo](#comment_18_15ZG53yDqMJyxRy3jfkC4NGeKapAC5CDrL): wtf lol, a wojak cult? The home page is pretty cool, but that pdf is pretty gay.

That's our primer you'll need to know that stuff to get into the door lol.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_248_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): tough crowd.  Im not actually interested in joining a cult... or clickin that link.   just thought id point out the obviousgood luck.

No worries think real life mages guild/community at sea.
Here's our telegram if you want to come visit us there: https://t.me/CultofRon

> [joalmo](#comment_19_15ZG53yDqMJyxRy3jfkC4NGeKapAC5CDrL): Anybody remember that UFO cult that all committed suicide because they thought Hale-Bopp was an alien spacecraft coming to take them to the next stage of human evolution? Their original clearnet website, still intact from 1997: http://heavensgate.com/

They had an opportunity to create something good. What happened to them was sad. l hope we avoid those pitfalls lol.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_252_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): can't say i've ever heard of a self proclaimed cult before

What I like about being an initial member is that I get to help shape an ideology.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_254_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): there is no shortage of ideology here lol.

I don't know if you checked it out or not but there's an easter egg in the source code lol

1565744159_1AM6ZY48ErJLzU89E7wPVjxoqyWuF.body:
If you're seeking a path to enlightenment the Cult of Ron is looking for YOU!

http://uhkhpnxopcrjvgmd.onion/
